title: Fix TUI app initialization and reactive state tests
description:
**As a** Consoul developer
**I want** TUI app initialization tests to pass
**So that** we can ensure the Textual app starts correctly

**Context:**
4 tests in tests/tui/test_app.py are failing due to app initialization and reactive state issues. These tests verify the ConsoulApp (Textual TUI) initializes correctly with AI integration.

**Technical Notes:**
- tests/tui/test_app.py - TUI app tests
- src/consoul/tui/app.py - ConsoulApp implementation
- Textual framework - async app lifecycle

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** ConsoulApp is initialized
**When** reactive state is checked
**Then** all reactive properties should be properly initialized

**Given** ConsoulApp is initialized with mock config
**When** AI integration is verified
**Then** model and history should be configured

**Given** a message is submitted
**When** AI processes it
**Then** user and assistant messages should display

**Failing Tests:**
- test_reactive_state_initialization
- test_app_initializes_with_mock_config
- test_message_submit_with_ai_displays_user_message
- test_new_conversation_creates_new_session

**Testing Considerations:**
- Use Textual's pilot for async testing
- Mock AI provider calls
- Verify widget mounting and reactive updates

**Implementation Hints:**
- Ensure app.run_test() context is used
- Mock get_chat_model to avoid real API calls
- Verify reactive properties have default values
- Check widget composition in on_mount
